Job Description:
Extensive experience in Salesforce data analysis, including data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes.
 Proficiency in utilizing Salesforce Analytics, including creating and managing reports and dashboards.
 Experience with Salesforce Data Loader and other data management tools.
 Proficiency in SQL and experience with relational databases such as MySQL or PostgreSQL.
 Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI.
 Knowledge of Python or R for data analysis, with the ability to write complex queries and scripts.
 Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze complex datasets to provide actionable insights.
 Experience in data cleaning, data preprocessing, and data quality management.
 Ability to work independently and collaboratively within a team to achieve project goals.
 Excellent verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to convey technical information.
 Experience in managing and optimizing large datasets to support business intelligence and reporting needs.
 Strong attention to detail and a commitment to high-quality, accurate data analysis.
